alert.note: Alert for Coastal Camden; Coastal Glynn (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 06 at 3:43PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Camden and southeastern Glynn Counties through 415 PM EDT... At 343 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Jekyll Island, or near Brunswick, moving southeast at 5 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph, pea size hail, and minor flooding due to heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Minor flooding due to heavy rainfall is possible. Locations impacted include... Brunswick, Jekyll Island and Dover Bluff. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
